DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim study ass effectiveness oral health educative intervention prevent early childhood caries ( ECC ) . Methods : The trial target 0- 12-month-old child mother Pelotas , Brazil . Twenty-four public health centre ( cluster ) randomly select assign intervention control group ( 12 cluster per intervention group ) . In center , 30 children/mothers select invited participate trial . Each mother interview order collect socio-economic demographic variable . The intervention group receive mean pamphlet oral health instruction , emphasize verbal instruction . Dental examination carry 1 year teeth surface determine caries status .
